item.title: Eurovision
item.description: I am so happy: my fav song this year Ziferblat - Bird of Pray is in top-10 and won their semi!

item.title: Playing Poker
item.description: Playing poker is funny, but only when you are winning or playing with chips. When you start playing with real money it becomes too stressful.
